text: The Bribe is a 1949 American crime drama movie directed by Robert Z. Leonard and Vincente Minnelli and was based on the 1947 short story of the same name by Frederick Nebel. It stars Robert Taylor, Ava Gardner, Charles Laughton, John Hodiak and was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1949 drama movies Category:1949 crime movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:American spy movies Category:Movies based on short stories Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by Robert Z. Leonard Category:Movies directed by Vincente Minnelli
title: The Bribe
